1.11.2.1.0.1: JEI integration is now optional, not required dependency. so it will not crash if JEI not installed.  Fixed JEI integration to work with new versions (4.4.x) of JEI.  Added safety checks so if JEI integration fails in future it will simply log error safely and not crash game
1.11.2.1.0.2: Fix some keys that are bound to JEI keys not getting passed through to search bar (R/U).  Added new button to clear search bar, mouse click no longer auto clicks search bar.   Several magic strings embedded in code are now in the .lang file for future translators.
1.11.2.1.0.3: Remove some console spam debug messages.  Both remotes now have a 3x3 crafting grid built in.  Remotes now correctly have max stack size one.  Fixed a server crash when something is removed from the network while an import or export node is acting on it.  Fix Export cable no showing its whitelist/blacklist toggle button.
1.11.2.1.0.4: Search bar will now auto focus as soon as the GUI is opened.  Search bar re-focuses when you press the Clear Search (X) button.  Fixed the Import Filter button ignoring the second row of slots.  Add Whitelist/blacklist toggle button to the purple storage link cable.
1.11.2.1.0.5: Fix compatibility with new JEI versions.  Fix crash with Collossal Chests.  Fix a crash when clicking empty slots in the Export Cable GUI.  Added the Import Filter buttons to the import and export cable GUIs.

1.12.1.0.5: Initial port to 1.12, still in alpha state
1.12.1.0.6: Update to work with new forge registry system
1.12.1.0.7: Fix recipes sometimes being disabled until game restart after a very specific setup (see issue #13 for details).
1.12.1.0.8: Fix Master and Request recipes giving out 4 instead of 1.  Fix items sometimes being deleted when using JEI to set a recipe into request table, while also having some items only on your hotbar and not in the network ( issue #16 ).  Search text box will no longer auto-clear its value when using JEI for a recipe and coming back.
1.12.1.0.9: Increase output of upgrade recipes.  Fix Storage Network items sometimes showing up in creative tab of other mods.  Add StorageRemoteRange to config file.  Optimization: cleaned up some code; Removed unused textures and models.
1.12.1.0.10: Fix crash that can sometimes happen when placing down request table
1.12.1.0.11: Fix item tooltip rendering.  Fix compatibility issue when connecting to Tinkers Construct machines.  Fixed items not rendering in grid and extracting correctly when connected to Storage Drawers.
1.12.1.0.12: Fix items getting deleted when you withdraw them from a network that has zero Storage Drawers.
1.12.1.0.13: Fix storage network items bleeding out into other creative tabs.  Tools weapons and armor should ignore damage values when inside import/export cable filters.
1.12.1.0.14: You can now right click the search bar to clear text (same result as X button).  JEI toggle moved left so its not covered up and hanging offscreen.  JEI with the network will now correctly find all recipe ingredients if an item is in more than one Ore Dictionary category (such as BTM multiblock wooden parts).
1.12.1.0.15: Attempt to stop lag spikes and crashes by being more careful around chunk unloading.  Addressed JEI recipe finder useing the wrong ore-dictionary item (such as getting the wrong colour of dye / getting lapis instead of inc sacks).   Compatible with Minecraft 1.12.2.  Minimum forge version is now 14.22.0.2464.  Updated JEI compatibility to 4.7.8.92.

1.12.1.1.1.0: You can now shift-click the upgrade items in an out of the four upgrade slots in the import/export cables.  Added two checkboxes to import and export cables: one to toggle matching metadata and one to toggle matching on the ore dictionary.  The export cable does not have a blacklist mode, only whitelist, so I removed the deceptive toggle button.  Optimized imports and export code.  Moved some hardcoded text out into the .lang files.
1.12.1.1.1.1: If you drop or move the remote away while holding it with the GUI screen open, it will now just close instead of crashing. .

1.12.2.1.2.0: Minimum forge version 14.23.0.2494.  Fixed Network packet too large crash when crafting recipes on large networks & modpacks with many recipes.  Storage Link Cable now has a GUI with Priority system and the whitelist/blacklist filter slots.  Also there is a new button that is only for Storage Link Cable GUI that allows you to set the connection as Output Only, meaning it will withdraw but not insert.  Tooltips now no longer hide behind the JEI screen.  Fix missing tooltip for Sort Direction button.  Fixed a bug to make sure cable upgrades now get dropped on the ground when the cable is broken.  Tightened up bounding box on the Storage Cable so it matches the model.  Improved performance and reduced some excess refresh calls (so crafting items and refreshing the grid are not as tightly coupled anymore).  Fixed the storage network from locking up the whole game when you are shift-click crafting (this was only noticeable in large modpacks with many many recipes, caused by a new recipe lookup search in each recipe iteration).  New config has been added to turn on benchmark logging in case future problems need to be detected, off by default.
1.12.2.1.2.1: Fixed item loss bug related to shift-click crafting (was introduced in latest update 1.2.0, in newer forge versions).
1.12.2.1.2.2: Fixed exceptions thrown to log when connecting to some modded blocks (Thermal expansion).  New config option ReloadNetworkWhenUnloadChunk that you can disable if your server has any chunk loading issues.
1.12.2.1.2.3: Fixed item dupe bug occurring with certain special case recipes.
1.12.2.1.2.4: Stack Upgrade now increases import/export size to a full stack (from 4 to 64 where previously it was from 4 to 8).  Upgrade Items now stack to 64 when outside of a cable.  Fixed and improved the power of the Speed Upgrade.
1.12.2.1.2.5: Requires forge version 14.23.1.2594 or higher.  Fixed item loss when using extractor cables along with speed upgrades.
